title: Pot o' Gold
summaries: The Pot o' Gold was a pet-summoning item used to summon Leprechaun o'Fyffe. The Leprechaun had a chance to drop coins when it jumped. It usually dropped Copper Coins, but had a chance to sometimes drop Silver, Gold, or even Platinum Coins. The 5 Rainbow Pieces needed to craft it used to fall from the sky during the St. Patrick's Day season.
